extendedInfo.description: â âChallenge yourself in this fun and popular puzzle gameâ âSolve the puzzle and advance to the next floor.Be the one to reach the topfloor and tell your friends about it.In this game logical solutions is in focus.This is the paid, ad-free version of the free game '100 Floors 2013'.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cliffdrop.floors2013 Guide:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cliffdrop.floors2013guideâ âFeaturesâ ââ Addictive!â Well developed!â HD graphics!â Constant updates of new Floors!â Use your device to the maximum!â âHow to playâ âMove objects, tilt, shake, pinch and swipe to find a way to solve the puzzle.Pick up items and use them from your inventory to help you find the solution.â âGot stuck?â âhttp://www.facebook.com/100Floors2013(Write to us and you will get an answer)Tags: 100 exits, 100 floors, 100 escapes, free, puzzle, 100 puzzle, challenge, 100 doors, 100 gates, 2013, 2014, new
